chapter.title: Introduction to &THIS.PLATFORM; &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM;
chapter.para: &THIS.PLATFORM; &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; is a J2EE compliant web-based application deployed in the running instance of Apache Tomcat, inside JBoss AS. It is designed to facilitate system management functions that will help get the best of any &THIS.PLATFORM; deployment .
Most system administrators will particularly appreciate the ease of use and the features offered by &THIS.PLATFORM; &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; through its HTTP web interface.

The &MANAGEMENT.PLATFORM; can be used to perform most common management operations like deployment/installation of JAIN SLEE Deployable Units, JAIN SLEE Component Management and Configuration,etc. It will also be useful for monitoring task such as observing and inspecting JAIN SLEE Activities.
